! parse
stderr 'cannot reference resource svc.Moo other than by calling methods on it'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
    "context"

    "encore.dev/storage/sqldb"
)

var Moo = sqldb.Named("moo")

//encore:api public
func Foo(ctx context.Context) error {
    return nil
}
-- svc/pkg/pkg.go --
package pkg

import (
    "context"
    "test/svc"
)

func Foo() {
    _ = svc.Moo
}
